title: 'Jurassic Park' star Sam Neill says he's being treated for stage 3 blood cancer
description: The actor opens up about his blood cancer diagnosis in his upcoming memoir, "Did I Ever Tell You This?"

title: 400K gallons of radioactive water leaked from nuclear power plant; cleanup underway
description: Minnesota agencies announced this week they are monitoring the cleanup of 400,000 gallons of radioactive water that leaked from a nuclear power plant this past fall.

title: WATCH:  Dog ready for adoption after surviving being shot
description: A dog named Bucky, who survived being shot in the face and left in the woods tangled to a tree, was paraded out to applause after recovering from his injuries, and is now ready to be adopted.

title: California plans $20 million overhaul for infamous prison
description: California's oldest state prison will get overhauled into a "one-of-a-kind" correctional institution that borrows rehabilitation practices from Norway.

title: Lance Reddick, star of 'The Wire' and 'John Wick,' dead at 60
description: Lance Reddick, and actor best known for "The Wire" and the "John Wick" franchise, died March 17 at 60.

title: African land snails found in luggage at Michigan airport
description: Six giant African land snails have been found in the luggage of a traveler who flew to Michigan from the west African country of Ghana

title: Men who play elite soccer more likely to develop dementia: Study
description: A new study published Friday found that elite soccer players are at a higher risk of developing dementia.

title: Favre must remain in welfare lawsuit, Mississippi argues
description: A Mississippi agency says a judge should reject retired NFL quarterback Brett Favre’s requests to be removed from a lawsuit seeking to recover misspent welfare money

title: Trump lawyer ordered to testify in classified docs case in landmark ruling: Sources
description: A judge has ruled that Trump attorney Evan Corcoran must provide additional testimony before a grand jury probing Trump's handling of classified documents, sources say.

title: Quadruple murder trial begins for former NY police officer
description: A federal jury in New York is continuing to listen to testimony in the murder trial of a former suburban New York police officer accused of masterminding the killing of four people

title: Former Air Force officer gets prison term for Capitol attack
description: A retired Air Force officer who stormed the U.S. Capitol dressed in combat gear and carried zip-tie handcuffs into the Senate gallery has been sentenced to two years in prison

title: Elementary school closes due to norovirus outbreak
description: A norovirus outbreak at Carver Elementary School in Long Beach, California, forced health officials to close the school after 136 students and staff reported symptoms.

title: Capitol Police say they didn't review Jan. 6 footage aired by Fox News
description: A court filing claims that most of the Jan. 6 footage aired by Tucker Carlson was shown without approval from Capitol Police -- despite Carlson's claims to the contrary.

title: Teen arrested in murder of transgender woman
description: A 17-year-old boy has been arrested in the fatal shooting of a transgender woman as Houston police continue to search for a second suspect.

title: Rural Missouri sheriff, 2 deputies arrested in kidnap plot
description: A rural Missouri sheriff and two deputies are jailed and facing charges accusing them of helping a man in a parental kidnapping plot

title: WATCH:  Couple poses for wedding photos at 'end of the world'
description: This couple traveled to the “end of the world” for some unique (and very scenic) wedding photos.

title: Hunter Biden files counterclaims against computer repairman over infamous laptop
description: Attorneys for Hunter Biden have filed counterclaims in response to a defamation suit brought by the computer repairman who they say triggered the laptop controversy.

title: Parent of Silicon Valley Bank seeks bankruptcy protection
description: SVB Financial Group is filing for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection

title: Russia to award pilots involved in US drone incident
description: Russia's Defense Ministry says fighter pilots involved in an incident with a U.S. drone that resulted in its crash will be given state awards

title: Michael Cohen 'absolutely' prepared to testify against Trump
description: Donald Trump's former attorney, Michael Cohen, reacted on "Good Morning America" Friday to completing his testimony before the grand jury mulling charges against Trump.

title: Supreme Court remembering Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg
description: The late Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg is being remembered during ceremonies at the Supreme Court

title: China's Xi to visit Putin amid Beijing's bolder global role
description: Chinese President Xi Jinping is planning to visit Russia from Monday to Wednesday in an apparent show of support for Russian President Vladimir Putin amid sharpening East-West tensions over the conflict in Ukraine

title: Trump vs. DeSantis: Rivals' very different styles on display
description: Trump views DeSantis as his only real rival for the Republican nomination.

title: Slovakia agrees to give Ukraine fleet of Soviet warplanes
description: Slovakia’s government has approved a plan to give Ukraine its fleet of Soviet-era MiG-29 fighter jets

title: Over 29,100 years spent in prison due to wrongful convictions: database
description: Over 29,100 years have been 'lost' in prison due to wrongful convictions, as Sidney Holmes' 400-year prison sentence garners attention amid his exoneration.

title: Pension funds report millions in losses amid financial crisis
description: An Ohio public pension fund for teachers revealed it lost millions by holding more than $27 million in Silicon Valley Bank shares before the bank’s collapse.
